explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

self_reactive_substances.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive or self-reactive properties present in the molecule.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures, which in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

oxidizing_solids.rationale: Organic compounds containing oxygen (but not chlorine and fluorine) and the oxygen is chemically bonded only to carbon and hydrogen (but not to other elements).

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Liquid at a test temperature, 55degC. Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: SPECIES: Rat (female) ENDPOINT: LD50 VALUE: 691 mg/kg REFERENCE SOURCE: Agricultural Chemicals abstracts

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: It was set as the outside of Category. Since rat LD50 value is >2000mg/kg and death is not observed at 2000mg/kg (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: Rat LC50 (4 hours) value is >4.2mg/L (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts). But the category could not be specified only by this data, it cannot be classified since data is insufficient.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: In the skin irritation test using a guinea pigs, it was the effects of exposure, mild irritation was seen for 24 hours (Agricultural -Chemicals abstracts). So it was set as Category 3.

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: The moderate irritant property was seen in the ocular irritation tests using the rabbits. However, the symptom disappeared after 7 days after administration (Agrichemical-Chemicals abstracts), therefore we classified it as Category 2B.

respiratory_skin_sensitizer.classification: Respiratory sensitization: Classification not possible; Skin sensitization: Not classified
respiratory_skin_sensitizer.rationale: Respiratory sensitization: No data. Skin sensitization: Since positive rate was 0% in the Buehler method test using the guinea pigs (Agrichemical Abstracts), we classified it to be Out Of Category.

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: There is a negative result in the micronucleus test which used the mouse marrow, which is an in vivo mutagenicity test using a somatic (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts). So it considered as the outside of Category.

carcinogenicity.hazard_statement: Suspected of causing cancer (state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard)
carcinogenicity.rationale: Since it was classified into A3 (ACGIH 7th, 2001) in ACGIH, it was considered as Category 2.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: In the teratogenicity study using rats and rabbits, reproductive toxicity was not observed at the dose in which general toxicity is observed in parent animals (Agricaltural-Chemicals abstracts). Therefore, it was out of the Category. Moreover, although it is an examination at the dose in which general toxicity is not observed in a parental animals, the effects on fertility is not observed in the reproduction study using a rat (Agricaltural-Chemicals abstracts).

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause respiratory irritation or may cause drowsiness and dizziness (narcotic effects)
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: Because of confirmation of sedation and comas in an oral administration study using rats, and confirmation of immediate lethargy after in a inhalation exposure test (Agricultural-Chemical abstracts), it was judged as Category 3 (anesthetic actions).

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organs/systemic toxicity following repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: In the repeated oral administration test using rats and dogs, toxicity was not observed with the dose of the guidance value range of Category 2, and since the significant toxicity which indicates the classification also with the dose exceeding the guidance value of Category 2 in the rats (feeding administration for 90 days) was not observed (Agrichemical Abstracts), it was judged to be Out Of Category.

acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 1 from 72-hour EbC50=0.00844mg/L of algae (Green algae) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 2005).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_statement: Very toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Classified into Category 1, since acute toxicity was Category 1, supposed not rapidly degrading (BIOWIN), though supposed less bioaccumulative (log Kow=2.11 (PHYSPROP Database, 2005)).
